segments.text: My heart just sinks looking at this poor woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on her task, completely unaware of the chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, ruining her kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a terrible shock it will be when she finally notices everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The clean garden outside seems almost mockingly peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there are the children, taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're putting themselves in danger, climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just feel a wave of sadness for the mess and the impending discovery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a moment of calm before a very stressful storm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could tell her what's happening, but I can only watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of all that wasted water and potential damage is truly disheartening.
segments.speaker: PAR
